roleset.name: play the role of dungeon master in Dungeons and Dragons

role.descr: the group of players presided over

example.name: dungeonmaster-v
example.text: it's a lot easier *PRO* to Dungeon Master for players who are having fun than players who are bored or disinterested.
example.arg: for players who are having fun

example.name: DM-v
example.text: We have two people so far , and I am able to DM ... although DM's are welcome .

roleset.note: DUNGEON_MASTER-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
DM-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
